known_issues: Website is showing only partial/few contents (user-reported)

existing_features.title: Replace mock-data usage in BugDetailPage/TestCaseDetailPage (and related upsert pages if they use mock submission) so that detail/edit views display and edit the real items from the selected website stored in the backend.

Ensure all pages that read generated content (Web App Testing, Bugs list, Test Cases list) clearly render the full generated datasets and provide basic UX to handle large lists (at minimum: loading states remain correct and lists are scrollable without truncation).

new_feature_requests.summary: Provide comprehensive list of website bugs and test scenarios (all scenarios)

Expand the backend template-based generator so that generating test data for a website produces a comprehensive baseline set of (a) test cases, (b) bugs, and (c) corner/edge-case scenarios instead of only a few items.
Fix backend ID assignment so all generated TestCase/Bug/CornerCase records have unique IDs and the next*Id counters are correctly incremented during generation (not just during manual add mutations).

projectName: Expand generated bug/scenario content and remove mock pages so all website content is shown
